content.rendered:
In honor of St. Patty’s day, here’s a GREEN smoothie that will have you either A) feeling good about yourself before you party for the holiday or B) help you feel better after you partied for the holiday as it’s a great detox drink… I gotchu girl.

1/2 cup pineapple

Handful of spinach

Handful of kale

Few pieces of parsley (great vitamin C if your immune system is low, or if you’re afraid of getting sick)

1/2 banana

1/2 cup coconut water

Blend. ENJOY!
